summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Walden Street, from Renton Avenue to Horton Street; Horton Street, from Walden Street to Courtland Place; Thirty-third Avenue South, from Hanford Street to Horton Street; Thirty-fourth Avenue South, from Hanford Street to Spokane Street; and Courtland Place, from Horton Street to Spokane Street, all in The City of Seattle, by attaching hydrants to the existing water mains therein, with all appurtenances necessary for the proper fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1461 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
